Core Math

su-span() function

Return a usable span width in either relative or static units

@function su-span(
  $span,
  $columns,
  $gutters,
  $spread,
  $container-spread: $spread,
  $location: 1
) { /* ... */ }
Parameters
namedescriptiontypedefault
$span

Number or list of grid columns to span

Number | List— none
$columns

List of columns available

List— none
$gutters

Width of a gutter in column-comparable units

Number— none
$spread

Number of gutters spanned, relative to span count

0 | 1 | -1— none
$container-spread

Number of gutters spanned, relative to columns count

0 | 1 | -1$spread
$location

Optional position of sub-span among full set of columns

Integer1
Requires
  • [function] su-valid-span
  • [function] su-valid-columns
  • [function] su-valid-gutters
  • [function] su-valid-spread
  • [function] su-valid-location
  • [function] su-slice
  • [function] su-sum
  • [function] su-valid-spread
  • [function] su-sum

su-gutter() function

Return a usable gutter length in either relative or static units

@function su-gutter(
  $columns,
  $gutters,
  $container-spread
) { /* ... */ }
Parameters
namedescriptiontypedefault
$columns

List of columns in the grid

List— none
$gutters

Width of a gutter in column-comparable units

Number— none
$container-spread

Number of gutters spanned, relative to columns count

0 | 1 | -1— none
Requires
  • [function] su-sum

su-sum() function

Get the total sum of column-units in a layout. If static-gutter units aren't comparable to column-units, gutters will be removed from the resulting sum

@function su-sum(
  $columns,
  $gutters,
  $spread,
  $validate: true
) { /* ... */ }
Parameters
namedescriptiontypedefault
$columns

List of columns in the grid

List— none
$gutters

Width of a gutter in column-comparable units

Number— none
$spread

Number of gutters spanned, relative to columns count

0 | 1 | -1— none
$validate

Check that arguments are valid before proceeding

Booltrue
Requires
  • [function] su-valid-columns
  • [function] su-valid-gutters
  • [function] su-valid-spread

su-slice() function

Return a subset of columns at a given location

@function su-slice(
  $span,
  $columns,
  $location: 1,
  $validate: true
) { /* ... */ }
Parameters
namedescriptiontypedefault
$span

Number of grid columns to span

Number— none
$columns

List of columns in the grid

List— none
$location

Starting index of a span in the list of columns

Number1
$validate

Check that arguments are valid before proceeding

Booltrue
Requires
  • [function] su-valid-columns
  • [function] su-valid-location
